introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: Jaro Kilo Pratishthan Nepal is registered with the Office of the Company Registrar under the Ministry of Industry, Government of Nepal, and affiliated with the Social Welfare Council of Nepal. As a non-profit service organization, it undertakes institutional initiatives to research, promote, and develop Nepal’s indigenous religions, culture, philosophy, traditions, arts, rituals, knowledge, craftsmanship, skills, yoga, Ayurveda, agriculture, and more. The organization was founded with a commitment to contribute to Nepal’s progress, prosperity, and development through activities in religious, cultural, social, educational, and economic fields. Jaro Kilo Pratishthan Nepal is dedicated to creating opportunities for entrepreneurship, employment, and personality development for Nepalese people, thereby contributing to the national economy and laying the foundation of a 'Compassionate Economy.' The organization envisions a 'Scientific Era of Truth,' based on the four pillars: 'Intelligence of Science, Advancement of Technology, Wisdom of Religion, Relation of Compassion.'

objectives.title: Objectives
list: Explore, research, develop, and promote Nepal’s indigenous religions, culture, philosophy, traditions, arts, rituals, knowledge, craftsmanship, skills, and Ayurveda.
Construct and operate various educational institutions, Gurukuls, cultural centers, service centers, dharmashalas, and related facilities.
Conduct and facilitate various skill-based training programs.
Research, develop, and promote Nepal’s indigenous medicines.
Research, develop, and promote Nepal’s traditional foods and beverages.
Conduct research, publications, and broadcasting on various aspects of Nepal.
Promote and preserve Nepal’s indigenous languages through organized activities.
Organize activities for the preservation of Nepal’s monasteries, temples, trusts, stupas, and viharas.
Preserve and promote Nepal’s indigenous Vedic, Buddhist, Jain, Kirati, Bon, and other religious and cultural heritage.
